PR Description

Documentation

 I thought about documentation and added the documentation label to this PR if updates are required.

nodes.bodyText:
I don't think we should be exposing the AggregatingAttestationPool from here.
The way providers are currently setup, they never return internal objects, only the external ones.  We should follow that same pattern in this provider.
It's very weird to have these comments here...
Feels like these don't need to be subclasses anymore.  Just pass the topic name and value type into the constructor.
